name: Fried Dill Pickles
author: DMJOLLY
summary: Dill pickle slices are breaded, then deep fried in peanut oil. A great snack.
ingredients: 1 (32 ounce) jar sliced dill pickles, drained
directions: In a small bowl, mix together the egg, milk, 1 tablespoon of flour, and Worcestershire sauce
In a separate bowl, stir together the remaining flour, salt, and pepper
Heat oil to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) in a deep-fryer or heavy deep skillet
Dip pickle slices into the milk mixture, then into the flour mixture
Place the pickles carefully into the hot oil
Avoid over crowding by frying in several batches
Fry until pickles float to the surface, and are golden brown
Remove with a slotted spoon, and drain on paper towels
